[TEXT]
<line: 14> V.

[TEXT]
<line: 16> Bulloch County Board of Commissioners; Lynn M..
<line: 17> Anderson, in his previous official capacity as Sheriff of.
<line: 18> Bulloch County, Georgia; SGT Kent Munsey, in his.
<line: 19> individual and official capacity; Officer Jared Shababy, in his
<line: 20> individual and official capacity; and APO Kyle Briley, in his
<line: 21> individual and official capacity,

[TEXT]
<line: 23> Jury Verdict. This action came before the Court for a trial by jury. The issues have been tried and the jury
<line: 24> has rendered its verdict.

[ABANDON]

[TEXT]
<line: 27> Decision by Court. This action came before the Court. The issues have been considered and a decision has been
<line: 28> rendered.

[ABANDON]

[TITLE]
<line: 31> IT IS ORDERED AND ADJUDGED

[TEXT]
<line: 33> that in accordance with the Court's Order dated January 23, 2019, judgment is hereby entered
<line: 34> dismissing the case without prejudice for Plaintiffs' failure to prosecute.
